summary: Provides a unified framework for hybrid RNNT/CTC speech-recognition models, managing model configuration, training, validation, testing, and transcription with support for dynamic decoding strategies and vocabulary changes.
business_intent: Allows developers and product teams to create, fine-tune, and deploy high-accuracy speech-to-text solutions that leverage both RNNT and CTC approaches, simplifying integration into applications that require flexible decoding and easy model export.
